creator: Top window covering
descriptionHtml: Shade Flow allows your shades to be controlled by a unique application that communicates with your shades via Bluetooth. You can move shades in your home up and down whenever you like through your smart device and even create automated patterns and schedules for different rooms to give you full control of a smart home.
descriptionShort: Shade Flow allows your shades to be controlled by a unique application...

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: 1、Add left sliding deletion function for groups and scenes.
